value:
Exalt Emmeryn... On my honor as a
pegasus knight of Ylisse, I will protect
you this time. I swear it.

To serve the exalt is my purpose. To
serve Emmeryn and her predecessor
has been my honor.

Morale in the Order of Heroes is
admirably high. An impressive
organization indeed.

Sumia may yet be a novice, but her
potential is vast. I intend to assist
her in realizing it to the fullest.

Cordelia's tenacity is second to none,
and her skill as a pegasus knight
approaches perfection.

Greetings from the sky above. I am
Phila—a pegasus knight serving under
$Nf's command.

My knight-sisters are with me in
spirit, wherever I go.

I must always be on guard. An attack
could come at any time.
Forgive me, Exalt Emmeryn...

I appreciate your support. I will make
good use of it—have no fear.

I am Phila, commander of Ylisse's
pegasus knights. I will do all I can
to keep the exalt safe from harm.

It is thanks to the many brave knights
who came before me that I have the
privilege of soaring through the sky.$k$pIn the same way, it is my duty to pass
my skills on to the next generation of
those who would mount a pegasus.$k$pThat is not to say I am contemplating
retirement. I have no plans of going
anywhere, $Nu.$k$pOn the contrary, I intend to make the
most of my time for as long as I can,
just as my predecessors before me.$k$pI believe I owe that to all those whose
lives were tragically cut short on the
field of battle.$k$pWhen I am gone, I hope that Askr will
remember me as one who lived each
moment to its fullest.
I will defend you.
With my life!
For Her Grace!
We must hurry!
Exalt...Emmeryn...
My name is Phila. I am the commander of Ylisse's pegasus knights.
Oh! Rather cowardly to ambush me, would you not agree?
Exalt Emmeryn, Prince Chrom, and Princess Lissa are all quite fond of one another. It gladdens me.
Cordelia has exceptional natural talent. I look forward to seeing her develop.
It is our duty to protect the exalt with our lives.
The spirit of the pegasus knights is with me, wherever I go.
Something about you is reminiscent of Exalt Emmeryn. I am happy to be by your side.
A wise move.
What shall I do?
Your request is clear.
